Sgm2Loc: <Precitec.Filter.Randkerbe3Inputs.Beschreibung Text="This filter detects defects near the upper part. Defects are identified by comparing the input laser line signal with a jump pattern. This comparison is done using the correlation coefficient. Also, it is required that a candidate defect be near the upper part. In order to enforce this requirement, the laser line signal is compared with a line segment. The parameters of this comparison may be adjusted in the GUI. These parameters are length of the line segment as well as the allowed deviation between laser line and the line segment. The result is 1 when a defect is detected, < 1 when only candidate defects are found."/>
